hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:"When the prayers were first enjoined they were of two rak`at each. Later the prayer in a journey was kept as it was but the prayers for non-travelers were completed." Az-Zuhri said, "I asked `Urwa what made Aisha pray the full prayers (in journey)." He replied, "She did the same as `Uthman did

chapter.ara-name: باب يَقْصُرُ إِذَا خَرَجَ مِنْ مَوْضِعِهِ
chapter.eng-name: When a traveller leaves his original place, he can shorten his Salat (prayer)
